檈字的基本解释

檈
xuán
古代有足的圆形的食物托盘。
以绳转轴裁木为器。

檈字的汉语字典释义

[①]［xuán］
［《廣韻》似宣切，平仙，邪。］
(1)古代带足的圆盘。
(2)以绳转轴裁木为器。

檈字的康熙字典解释

【辰集中】【木字部】　檈； 康熙笔画：17； 页码：页556第15
【唐韻】似宣切【集韻】【類篇】甸宣切，?音旋。【說文】圜案也。【廣韻】承食之案。　又【唐韻】相倫切【集韻】須倫切，?音荀。義同。　又【集韻】【類篇】?隨戀切，旋去聲。一曰以繩轉軸也。一曰裁木爲器也。

檈字的源字形

字源演变：

小篆楷体

字形对比：

中国大陆宋体台湾细明体韩国明朝体
檈字的起名意思

暂无。

檈
Basic explanation of words
檈
xuán
A round food tray with feet in ancient times.
Use the rope shaft to cut wood as a tool.
檈
Chinese dictionary definition of words
[①]［xuán］
["Guangyun" is like Xuanqi, Pingxian, evil. ]
(1) An ancient disc with feet.
(2) Use the rope shaft to cut wood as a tool.
檈
Kangxi dictionary interpretation of words
[Chen Ji] [Wood Character Department] 　檈; Kangxi Strokes: 17; Page Number: Page 556 15
【Tang Yun】Similar to Xuan Qi 【Ji Yun】【Class Chapter】Dian Xuan Qi,? Yin Xuan. [Said the text] Won case also. [Guang Yun] Case of Chengshi.　[Tang Yun] Xiang Lun Qi [Ji Yun] Xu Lun Qi,? Yin Xun. The same meaning.　 [Ji Yun] [Class Chapter]? Cut with love, spin away. One said that the shaft is also roped. One said that cutting wood is also a tool.
檈
